get.description: Retrieves a summary of parent details for a particular student

parameters.name: zoneId
parameters.description: 4 character alphanumeric code of the school

parameters.name: eqId
parameters.description: The student EQId

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The client authorisation credentials or token

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: ISO 8601 formatted datetime specifying the date/time of the request

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Specify the format of the response: application/xml or application/json

parameters.name: messageId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the message

navigationCount.description: The total number of records matching the search criteria

navigationPage.description: The current page number (this is a 1-based index)

navigationPageSize.description: The number of records returned in this response

Content-Type.description: Describes the format of the response: application/xml or application/json

messageId.description: Unique identifier of the message. If provided in the request, then it is the same value as supplied in the request header.

messageType.description: The message type. Will be RESPONSE for a successful response.

responseAction.description: The response action. Will be QUERY for this action.

navigationPage.description: The current page number (this is a 1-based index)

navigationPageSize.description: The number of records returned in this response

messageType.description: The message type. Will be RESPONSE for a successful response.
